Class GameMap

extends java.util.Observable
implements Representable
    This class implements the game map

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible(Player watchingPlayer,
                         Player otherPlayer)
        Returns true if and only if the player2 is visible from the player1. This is done looking at the rooms ID of the squares where the player are.
        Parameters:
        watchingPlayer - player how is observing.
        otherPlayer - player target.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the player2 is visible from the player1.

        Parameters:
        coordinates1 - starting coordinates.
        coordinates2 - end coordinates.
        Returns:
